shorts.title: RailRiders rally late to beat WooSox
shorts.title_distilled: RailRiders rally late to beat WooSox.
shorts.description: The Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders rallied from a five-run deficit to beat Worcester, 8-7, on Tuesday at Polar Park. The RailRiders sent 12 batters to the plate in the seventh, scoring seven runs on seven hits. Trailing, 5-1, Jeimer Candelario singled in Brennen Davis to cut the Worcester lead to three runs. A groundout by Shewmake brought home a second run. MLB rehabber Austin Slater walked to load the bases with two outs and Vivas doubled to tie the game at 5. Spencer Jones followed with a two-run double for a 7-5 lead, and Davis singled in Jones to build an 8-5 advantage. […]
shorts.content: The Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders rallied from a five-run deficit to beat Worcester, 8-7, on Tuesday at Polar Park. The RailRiders sent 12 batters to the plate in the seventh, scoring seven runs on seven hits. Trailing, 5-1, Jeimer Candelario singled in Brennen Davis to cut the Worcester lead to three runs. A groundout by Shewmake brought home a second run. MLB rehabber Austin Slater walked to load the bases with two outs and Vivas doubled to tie the game at 5. Spencer Jones followed with a two-run double for a 7-5 lead, and Davis singled in Jones to build an 8-5 advantage. […]
shorts.content_distilled: Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders rallied from a five-run deficit to beat Worcester, 8-7, on Tuesday at Polar Park.

entities.name: MLB rehabber Austin Slater walked to load the bases with two outs and Vivas doubled to tie the game

shorts.title: Chris Kelly Opinion: County Dem Machine to voters: Drop dead.
shorts.title_distilled: Chris Kelly Opinion: County Dem Machine to voters: Drop dead.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Democratic Machine is determined to deny voters a say in who assumes the throne abdicated in late February by departed Commissioner Matt McGloin.
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Democratic Machine is determined to deny voters a say in who assumes the throne abdicated in late February by departed Commissioner Matt McGloin.

shorts.title: Dunmore data center roundtable aims to educate public
shorts.title_distilled: Dunmore data center roundtable aims to educate public.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Data centers have been getting lots of attention in NEPA lately, and now state legislators are joining the conversation to find out how the potential developments may impact their constituents. A meeting at a local university on Tuesday hoped to inform the local community and lawmakers on all aspects of [...]

shorts.title: Restoring significant Scranton performing arts center
shorts.title_distilled: Restoring significant Scranton performing arts center.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A historic building and a pivotal piece of the community in Lackawanna County is being restored. The Scranton Cultural Center at the Masonic Temple is under construction both inside and out to restore it to its original state. 28/22 News Reporter Colby Hughes stopped by the Electric City to tell [...]
